thread.title_full: Brendon McCullum opens up how Chris Cairns tried to drag him into fixing

title: Brendon McCullum opens up how Chris Cairns tried to drag him into fixing
text: Brendon McCullum opens up how Chris Cairns tried to drag him into fixing Friday, 16 October 2015 (2 minutes ago) Brendon McCullum said that Chris Cairns had masked his income from spot-fixing by using it to buy property. NEW Zealand captain Brendon McCullum has told a London court of the insidious way Chris Cairns allegedly tried to talk him into fixing cricket matches. Herald Sun 12 hours ago - Sports You Might Like Other recent news in Sports
